title: Retrieve a UK Property Business' Accounting Adjustments
description: This endpoint allows the user to request the adjustments made to a specific UK Property Business Source Adjustable Summary by quoting it's identifier.

adjustments.description: Object containing the adjustments made to this calculation.

income.description: An object containing the adjustments to the Income values.

rentIncome.description: The adjustment to total property rental income. The total amount of property rental Income. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

premiumsOfLeaseGrant.description: The adjustment to premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

reversePremiums.description: The adjustment to reverse premiums and inducements. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

otherPropertyIncome.description: The adjustment to other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

expenses.description: An object containing the adjustments to the Expenses values.

premisesRunningCosts.description: The adjustment to rent, rates, insurance, ground rents etc. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

repairsAndMaintenance.description: The adjustment to property repairs and maintenance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

financialCosts.description: The adjustment to loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

professionalFees.description: The adjustment to legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

travelCosts.description: The adjustment to car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

costOfServices.description: The adjustment to cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

residentialFinancialCost.description: The adjustment to the residential financial cost that can be deductible from rental income (tax relief). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

other.description: The adjustment to other allowable property expenses. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
